name: Reworkedprojectexamsystem
tagline: Works on windows, made using Visual studio 2015, it's an exam system project that uses .txt databases and got games inside of it and most of the contents can work with people who can't use the keyboard like blind people.
body: Yea, I think I need a designer for this.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
